edu.mines.jtk.mesh

Class TriSurf.Face

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mines.jtk.mesh.TriSurf.Face
  • Enclosing class:
    TriSurf

    public static class TriSurf.Face
extends java.lang.Object
    One triangular face in the surface. Each face references three nodes (A, B, and C), and up to three face neighbors (nabors) opposite those nodes. A null nabor denotes an edge (opposite the corresponding node) on the surface boundary. The nodes A, B, and C are in CCW order.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.Object data
      A data object associated with this face.
      int index
      An integer index associated with this face.

        public int index
